title: Cascade Falls IPA
description: A bold West Coast IPA brewed with Cascade and Centennial hops.
tasting_notes: Bright citrus and pine on the nose with a clean bitter finish. Notes of grapefruit and resinous hops.

title: Midnight Stout
description: A smooth and rich dry stout with layers of roasted malt complexity.
tasting_notes: Deep coffee and dark chocolate flavors with a silky mouthfeel and subtle roasted bitterness.

title: Golden Lager
description: A crisp and refreshing American lager perfect for any occasion.
tasting_notes: Light and clean with subtle malt sweetness. Crisp and highly drinkable with a soft bready finish.

title: Honey Wheat
description: A hazy wheat ale brewed with local wildflower honey for a touch of sweetness.
tasting_notes: Soft wheat character with delicate floral honey notes and a smooth easy-drinking finish.

title: Raspberry Sour
description: A tart and refreshing berliner weisse loaded with fresh raspberry puree.
tasting_notes: Bright raspberry sourness with a clean lactic tartness. Lightly pink and absolutely refreshing.

title: Double IPA Inferno
description: An intense West Coast Double IPA with massive hop aroma and punishing bitterness.
tasting_notes: Waves of tropical fruit and dank resin. Big hop bitterness balanced by a solid malt backbone.

title: English Brown Ale
description: A traditional English-style brown ale with rich nutty malt character.
tasting_notes: Toasted bread and hazelnut with a hint of caramel. Balanced and malt-forward with a dry finish.

title: Pumpkin Porter
description: A seasonal autumn porter brewed with real pumpkin and warming spices.
tasting_notes: Roasted malt with pumpkin spice warmth â€” cinnamon
beverage_style: and a hint of vanilla in every sip.

title: Winter Warmer
description: A robust winter ale with a full body and holiday spice character.
tasting_notes: Rich caramel and dried fruit notes with warming spice and a long smooth finish. Perfect for cold evenings.

title: Belgian Witbier
description: A classic Belgian-style white ale spiced with coriander and orange peel.
tasting_notes: Hazy and pale with fresh citrus zest and gentle spice. Light bodied and wonderfully refreshing.

title: Session IPA
description: A crushable session IPA with big hop flavor at a modest strength.
tasting_notes: Tropical and citrusy hop aroma with a light clean body. All the flavor of an IPA without the weight.

title: Coffee Porter
description: A smooth porter dry-hopped with cold-brew coffee from a local roastery.
tasting_notes: Rich coffee and dark chocolate with a smooth velvety body. Coffee forward but never bitter.

title: Passionfruit Gose
description: A tropical take on the traditional German gose with passionfruit and sea salt.
tasting_notes: Tart and tropical with a subtle salty bite. Passionfruit leads and a clean refreshing finish follows.

title: Hazy New England IPA
description: A juicy and pillowy soft NEIPA bursting with tropical hop flavor.
tasting_notes: Mango and stone fruit explode on the palate. Soft bitterness and a creamy smooth body throughout.

title: Oatmeal Stout
description: A silky oatmeal stout with extra body from flaked oats and roasted barley.
tasting_notes: Smooth and creamy with dark chocolate and espresso notes. Oats add a luxurious silky texture.

title: Classic Apple Cider
description: A dry craft cider made from freshly pressed Pacific Northwest apples.
tasting_notes: Crisp apple flavor with a pleasantly dry finish. Light effervescence and clean fruit character.

title: Dry Hopped Pilsner
description: A Czech-inspired pilsner dry-hopped with Saaz hops for extra floral aroma.
tasting_notes: Crisp and clean with a floral Saaz hop nose. Soft malt base and a refreshingly dry bitter finish.

title: Farmhouse Saison
description: A rustic Belgian-style farmhouse ale fermented with a wild yeast strain.
tasting_notes: Earthy and spicy with hints of pepper and hay. Complex and funky with a bone-dry effervescent finish.

title: Peach Cider
description: A semi-sweet summer cider made with ripe peaches and fresh-pressed apple juice.
tasting_notes: Bright peachy sweetness balanced by natural apple acidity. Juicy and refreshing with a clean finish.

title: Dark Lager
description: A smooth and approachable Munich-style dunkel with toasted malt character.
tasting_notes: Dark amber with bready Munich malt sweetness. Clean lager profile with hints of toasted bread and caramel.
